name: Kiss/OFF: AUDITION
description:
IT'S THE ROLE OF A LIFETIME!

It's a big, big day for Vic Powers, college track star and all-around hunk. 

His *crush* is coming over for a study session, and he's working up the courage to ask them out! Then the phone rings.

"Convince your crush to go out with you...or you'll never see them again."

With that command from the mysterious 'X,' the Audition is off!

Now, it's up to Vic to flirt for his life with three unique love interests, flirting (or failing) his way towards the climactic showdown with 'X.'

Let the Audition...begin!

* Kiss/OFF: AUDITION is a prologue and a teaser for Kiss/OFF, a huge date-or-die alien-dating visual novel coming in 2022.

♥FEATURES♥
  • Three unique love interests, each one more damaged than the last
  • Dozens of unique endings, based on how well (or terribly) Vic flirts
  • Family friendly fun with tentacles
  • An original soundtrack with half a dozen sick beats
  • One very special secret true ending
  • A price tag of $0 and 0 cents
